_header: Here may men look who likes to lere
Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle; ‘Tractatus de legenda sanctorum’
_description: Prologue (8 lines) to the ‘Tractatus de legenda sanctorum’ in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Here may men luke who likes to lereof liues and dedis of saintes sere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And first es ordand forto sheweþe solempne fest of Saint Andrew
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Incipit hic tractatus de legendi sanctorum (rubric, f. 133ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 3.
